tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_designs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  designer_name VARCHAR(50),
  design_sketch TEXT,
  fabric_sample BLOB,
  production_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE designers (
    designer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    design_sketches TEXT,
    fabric_samples TEXT,
    production_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE designs (
    design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id INT,
    design_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    design_description TEXT,
    design_image_url VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES designers(designer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_designers (
    designer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    design_sketches JSONB,
    fabric_samples JSONB,
    production_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE design_sketches (
    sketch_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id UUID REFERENCES fashion_designers(designer_id),
    sketch_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    sketch_image BYTEA,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE fabric_samples (
    sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id UUID REFERENCES fashion_designers(designer_id),
    sample_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sample_image BYTEA,
    material TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE production_notes (
    note_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id UUID REFERENCES fashion_designers(designer_id),
    note_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    note_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE designers (
    designer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    design_sketches TEXT,
    fabric_samples BYTEA,
    production_notes TEXT
);
